channel.title: PLEASE HELP ME ll 2006 revision ll
channel.description:
So i downloaded a 2006 revision source+client pacakge
I get this when i run the the server from the source file:
[code]Loaded clipmap in 50ms. expection in thread main java.lang.outofmemoryerror: java heap space at org.utopia.rs2.world.worldmap.loadworldmap<worldmap.java:48> at org.utopia.rs2.buildserver.serverengine.main<serverengine.java:64[/code]
Please reply THANK YOU ILY

the xmx amount in your run, make it lower

item.title: PLEASE HELP ME ll 2006 revision ll
item.dc:creator: @fookme fookme
item.description:
@fookme wrote:

@ shane
it didnt really help,
Please someone reply that can help me? i’m looking to fix a 06 shard revolutions source i get this when i run the server from the source file:

Loaded clipmap in 50ms. expection in thread main java.lang.outofmemoryerror: java heap space at org.utopia.rs2.world.worldmap.loadworldmap<worldmap.java:48> at org.utopia.rs2.buildserver.serverengine.main<serverengine.java:64

Read full topic
item.source: PLEASE HELP ME ll 2006 revision ll

item.title: PLEASE HELP ME ll 2006 revision ll
item.dc:creator: @jo_yo_mama1 jo yo mama1
item.description:
@jo_yo_mama1 wrote:

lol that happens to me a lot what it is, you downloaded someones file to were it said source and client? what happens is eventually the owner of the client and source will say ‘‘okay to many people have this server now’’ so he will go and remove the source inside of the bundle but the folder thinks its still in there. so when you download it! it will pop up a box like that. its hard to find a server download that doesnt do that. . . i use http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,495620.0.html i like the v2 the best out of all of them but thats just a lil thing for ya hope this helped.
-Shane

Read full topic
